about_the_game:
Become an Adventurer on an epic journey through a vibrant digital world, where learning Python is the key to unlocking new realms. Dodge obstacles, solve logic puzzles, and harness coding powers to outsmart enemies in this adventure-packed platformer. With every step, you will grow closer to mastering the code and unveiling the mysteries of the world.

  • An epic journey of discovery where coding meets creativity in a single-player adventure full of humor and heart.

  • Dive into handcrafted levels packed with Python-themed challenges, pushing your problem-solving and platforming skills to the limit.

  • Master tricky puzzles and uncover secrets, all while learning the magic of coding in an interactive and memorable way.

  • Meet a delightful cast of characters, each bringing their unique personality to guide and entertain you on your quest.

  • Engaging mechanics that blend gameplay with coding, from unlocking gates to lighting torches, ensuring every challenge feels rewarding.
detailed_description:
Become an Adventurer on an epic journey through a vibrant digital world, where learning Python is the key to unlocking new realms. Dodge obstacles, solve logic puzzles, and harness coding powers to outsmart enemies in this adventure-packed platformer. With every step, you will grow closer to mastering the code and unveiling the mysteries of the world.

  • An epic journey of discovery where coding meets creativity in a single-player adventure full of humor and heart.

  • Dive into handcrafted levels packed with Python-themed challenges, pushing your problem-solving and platforming skills to the limit.

  • Master tricky puzzles and uncover secrets, all while learning the magic of coding in an interactive and memorable way.

  • Meet a delightful cast of characters, each bringing their unique personality to guide and entertain you on your quest.

  • Engaging mechanics that blend gameplay with coding, from unlocking gates to lighting torches, ensuring every challenge feels rewarding.

mac_requirements.minimum:
Minimum:
  • OS: Lion 10.7.5, 32/64-bit
  • Processor: Intel Core i3 M380
  • Memory: 2 GB RAM
  • Graphics: OpenGL 3.0+

name: PY-ONEERS

pc_requirements.minimum:
Minimum:
  • Requires a 64-bit processor and operating system
  • OS *: Windows 7 or newer
  • Processor: Intel Core i3 M380
  • Memory: 2 GB RAM
  • Graphics: Intel HD 4000
  • Storage: 200 MB available space
pc_requirements.recommended:
Recommended:
  • Requires a 64-bit processor and operating system

short_description: Journey through a digital world where Python powers your progress. Solve coding puzzles, dodge obstacles, and reveal secrets in this educational platformer. Each level unlocks new skills and challenges—can you conquer the code and reach mastery?
